name: Nielsen in the Panopticon
description:
Nielsen in the Panopticon is a simple prototype of a 2D platformer created for class AET333K (Game Prototyping) under the Art and Entertainment Technologies major in the College of Fine Arts at the University of Texas at Austin. 

Read the design doc here

Listen to the demo here

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump
  • Esc to return to main menu
